posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.40.0 (153600)

Builds will no longer be published to Firebase App Distribution

73 new commits since 7.39.4:

Show commits

  • Upgrade compose bom to latest stable. [1]

  • Fix application crash when failing to download backup types. [2]

  • Remove message send REST fallback. [3]

  • Focus on correct textfield when adding a description. [4]

  • Fix EmojiView scroll in bottomsheet. [5]

  • Prevent wrong closing animation for stories. [6]

  • Convert donations apis to WebSocket. [7]

  • Generalize preventing WebSocket from connecting in various app states. [8]

  • Use state to support back pressed callback. [9]

  • Fix badge bottomsheet color and scrolling. [10]

  • Add groups in common screen. [11]

    Adds a new screen to show which groups the user has in common with another user.

  • Attempt to reclaim username in more places during/after registration. [12]

  • Update to and integrate with libsignal v0.69.0. [13]

  • Fix incorrectly oriented back navigation icons for top app bar RTL layouts. [14]

    Replace symbol_arrow_left_24 with symbol_arrow_start_24 (which has auto-mirroring enabled) for top app bar navigation back icons to properly support RTL layouts.

  • Update quoteIds for edited message and ignore stale messages in isQuoted. [15]

  • fixup! Update profile initials after name change. [16]

  • Support scroll for call link screens. [17]

  • Remove prefix before username aci fetch. [18]

  • Update MyStoryItem on profile change. [19]

  • Prevent recipient hot loop on main thread. [20]

  • Fix missing timestamps on undownloaded media messages. [21]

  • Re-migrate delete account to WebSocket. [22]

  • Improve AvatarImage to update on recipient changes. [23]

  • Migrate calls to deprecated libsignal methods. [24]

  • Fix lint for IAP test and main toolbar. [25]

  • Add chat folder support to storage service. [26]

  • Correct RemoteConfig to enable libsignalWebSocket for nightly builds. [27]

  • Fix group member review avatar and "other groups in common" copy. (#4813) [32]

    • Fixes ReviewBannerView erroneously using the note to self icon instead of the current user's profile photo.
    • Fixes the "other groups in common" copy, which was missing the word "other".

  • Show "declined" for declined voice and video calls instead of "missed". [33]

    Closes #14081
    Fixes #14080

  • Update blocked string for groups. [34]

  • Depend on libsignal-net's connection backoff instead of duplicating at app-level. [35]

  • Pass InAppPayments around by ID instead of passing the entire object. [36]

  • Consolidate duplicated logic to retrieve groups in common. [37]

    Merges all of these into GroupsInCommonRepository:

    • ConversationSettingsRepository.getGroupsInCommon()
    • CallLinkIncomingRequestRepository.getGroupsInCommon()
    • ContactSearchPagedDataSourceRepository.getGroupsInCommon()
    • ReviewUtil.getGroupsInCommonCount()
    • AboutSheetRepository.getGroupsInCommonCount()

  • Reimplement megaphone UI in compose. [38]

  • Make FABs stack scrollable for small height in landscape mode. [39]

  • Fix donation pills UI for large Font and other UI improvements. [40]

  • Linkify story captions. [41]

  • Support zoom for avatar preview. [42]

  • Add compose megaphone stuff to MainBottomChrome composable. [43]

  • Update chat folder tests. [44]

  • Fix image loading for megaphones. [45]

  • Add predictive back gesture support to MainActivity. [46]

  • Allow long text to be sent via notification replies. [47]

  • Support opening scheduled document files. [48]

  • Avoid sending blank replies and do not clear input when sending reactions. [49]

  • Prevent conversation re-launch on reconfiguration of screen. [50]

  • Remove duplicate error handling in MediaSelection. [51]

  • Bump libsignal to v0.69.1. [52]

  • Fix Image expanded caption scroll to top. [53]

  • Fix content width shrinking megaphones. [54]

  • Remove outdated config check affecting proximity lock behavior during calling. [55]

  • Fix thumbPositon jitter while editing video. [56]

  • Add proper adaptive material app scaffolding. [57]

  • Notify conversations for deleted stories. [58]

  • Add progress dialog support to bottom snackbar. [59]

  • Clear window insets listener when view is detached from window. [60]

  • Prevent child clickable in message selection state. [61]

  • Fix conversation nav bar click. [62]

  • Update to NDK r28 for 16kb page support. [63]

  • Align the libnative-utils to 16kb pages. [64]

  • Set corner radius of nav bar icons to half height. [65]

  • Fix color issue on call toast popup. [66]

  • Fix how navigation bar colors are set and interacted with in MainActivity. [67]

  • Remove old deleted folders from storage service. [68]

  • Move live state into if statement for AvatarImage. [69]

  • Use unauth WebSocket after quick restore for transfer mode decision. [70]

  • Remove unnecessary boolean return for conversations. [71]

  • Update translations and other static files. [72]

  • Bump version to 7.40.0 [73]

on it.

Ideally, it will be added incrementally. Due to the age of the app, there are lots of places where it either still uses the deprecated Activity#onBackPressed or incorrectly uses an OnBackPressedCallback.
